response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to you, and I am thrilled to extend this opportunity to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent chance to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 14000}
